title: Trump Makes TACOs, 3 Altcoins to Pump Amid Hidden Bullish Signals
body: In case you’ve been living under a rock, Trump’s been making TACOs recently. The acronym, for Trump Always Chickens Out, has become a major talking point when analyzing Trump’s ongoing trade war. Could it explain why most cryptos are trading sideways at the moment? Given the market uncertainty due to Trump’s constantly changing trade wars, Bitcoin is losing some of its shine, and people are asking, What are the best altcoins to buy now? Time for a closer look. Trump, Master of Unpredictability, Continues His Work What’s the single biggest factor limiting crypto growth right now? It’s not the US regulatory environment, which is increasingly pro-crypto. Indeed, right now Congress is in session debating a landmark stablecoin bill. It’s not even the US economy, which has proven surprisingly resilient. It’s Trump’s approach to the trade wars he himself initiated. On key geopolitical issues, like the war in Ukraine, Trump shows signs of changing his tune. And on tariffs and direct trade-related matters, he’s again demonstrating his trademark indecision, with a surprise increase in steel and aluminum tariffs (mostly targeted at China) the latest development. The cryptocurrency market has had to grapple with the fallout, as President Trump’s erratic economic strategies cast a shadow over investor confidence and stall the momentum of digital assets. That was clear in $BTC ETF outflows following Trump’s latest announcements. A net $430M outflow on Friday and another $130M on Monday highlight how rattled investors are. Adding to the risk potential is the approaching end to the 90-day ‘pause’ in tariffs Trump placed on most US trading partners. We’re well over halfway through the pause period, and sky-high tariffs could resume as early as July unless something changes. And yet, TACO uncertainty hasn’t caused widespread losses, but rather a curious mixture of gains, sideways trading, and localized losses. Market Stability Hides Crypto Gains and Falls For one thing, Bitcoin has remained remarkably stable, mainly trading sideways around $105K. There’s not a lot of movement lately, with $BTC down around 0.2% over the past 24 hours. Despite this, market sentiment remains pro-Bitcoin, with news of more companies moving to purchase Bitcoin. Beyond Bitcoin, the rest of the crypto market is a mixed bag. Solana ($SOL) – down 9.4% over the past week, as questions remain about proposed $SOL ETFs Dogecoin ($DOGE) – down 15% over seven days, even as Elon Musk leaves the US Department of Government Efficiency (DOGE) XRP ($XRP) – down 5.34% over the week, even while trading volume remains high Cardano ($ADA) – down 10.33% in a week, but up 3.16% daily, fighting to break through a key $0.70 price barrier It can’t all be blamed on Trump; $XRP and $ADA’s trials could be down to their waiting on the SEC for long-running ETF applications. But, as far as uncertainty goes, even SEC Commissioner Caroline Crenshaw says the SEC needs to do more to provide clarity. While Trump and the SEC decide what to do next, crypto presses on. Here are three of the best altcoins poised to quietly make big gains despite the uncertainty. BTC Bull Token ($BTCBULL) – Free Bitcoin Airdrops for $BTCBULL Holders What’s one way to profit from crypto? Build a project around the most profitable crypto, Bitcoin itself. BTC Bull ($BTCBULL) does just that. Buy $BTCBULL , hold it on your Best Wallet app , and you could earn free $BTC when Bitcoin’s price reaches $150K and $200K. You can also look forward to a mega $BTCBULL airdrop when Bitcoin reaches $250K. It’s one of the easiest ways to diversify your exposure to Bitcoin. With $BTCBULL, you have four ways to earn: Presale $BTCBULL staking $BTCBULL price increase post-launch $BTC airdrop for token holders using Best Wallet app $BTCBULL airdrop when Bitcoin hits $250K On the other hand, token burns for $BTCBULL are programmed for when $BTC hits $125K, $175K, and $225K, reducing supply and driving up the price of $BTCBULL. This Yin and Yang structure of alternate airdrops and token burns keeps BTC Bull Token moving in tandem with $BTC, though at a far, far lower price. $BTCBULL currently costs just $0.002545, but our price prediction shows the token could increase 230% to reach $0.0084 by year’s end. Remember to hold your tokens in the Best Wallet app and stay tuned to the $BTCBULL X channel to ensure you get your share of those airdrops. When the requirements are posted, act fast to secure your free Bitcoin. Visit BTC Bull Token presale page . Cardano ($ADA) – Will Growing Adoption Power $ADA Past Resistance? Cardano has an interesting story. Only a few years ago, it was touted as one of the legendary ‘Ethereum killers,’ heir to Ethereum’s spot as the number 2 crypto behind Bitcoin. Cardano and XRP, among others, were tipped to break through with faster transaction speeds and lower fees, stealing Ethereum’s crown as the leading DeFi protocol. These days, though, Ethereum seems safer than ever in second place. So, rather than try to replace Ethereum, chains like Cardano have evolved alongside it. The Cardano network recently passed 110M transactions, indicating broad adoption and support. And yet, the token’s price hasn’t been able to break through the $0.70 resistance mark, held back by futures volatility and ETF uncertainty. If it does push through, could Cardano make big gains and return to its recent highs above $1.20? Best Wallet Token ($BEST) – Top Utility for Next-Generation Crypto Wallet Best Wallet Token ($BEST) is the native token of a top Web3 wallet, Best Wallet. Aside from being non-custodial, no-KYC, multi-chain, and highly secure, the Best Wallet app is the only crypto wallet focusing on presales. It offers a built-in ‘Upcoming Tokens’ section that gathers the top crypto presales in one place, letting investors research and purchase tokens long before they reach the open market. The $BEST token dials wallet functionality up to 11, adding: Early access to the best new crypto projects Higher staking rewards Reduced transaction fees $BEST holders can also participate in community governance and make their voice heard on the direction of the project. title: Binance Alpha, Binance’s Research and Early Investment Division, Announces Listing of a New Altcoin!
body: Zircuit (ZRC), an AI-powered zero-knowledge (ZK) Layer 2 blockchain, has been officially released on the Binance Alpha platform. Along with this launch, a special airdrop event has also been launched for eligible users. Zircuit (ZRC) Launched on Binance Alpha with Exclusive Airdrop for Eligible Users According to the statement made by Binance, users with a minimum of 211 Binance Alpha points will be able to claim a reward of 2,666 ZRC tokens via the Alpha Events page starting from 11:30 on June 3, 2025. ZRC is the native token of the Zircuit network, offering an advanced ZK Layer 2 solution powered by AI optimizations. This technology aims to enable scalable, secure, and low-cost transactions built on top of mainnets like Ethereum. Zircuit’s presence on Binance Alpha allows the project to reach a wider audience and offer rewards for early adopters. The airdrop campaign aims to both accelerate the launch of ZRC and increase user engagement within the Binance Alpha ecosystem. In order to benefit from the airdrop, users must have achieved a certain level in the Binance Alpha points system. This system awards points based on various criteria, such as completing tasks on Binance and participating in on-platform events. Zircuit is increasingly gaining traction among the Ethereum community and DeFi projects with its ZK technology, which promises enhanced privacy and scalability. The ZRC token is expected to spread to a wider ecosystem with exchange listings and use cases on the network in the future. *This is not investment advice. title: Tether allocates 10,500 BTC for SoftBank’s investment into Twenty One Capital
body: Tether CEO Paolo Ardoino revealed that the company has allocated as much as 10,500 BTC to support SoftBank’s investment into the Bitcoin-focused firm Twenty One Capital. In a recent post , Ardoino shared a recent transaction block from Mempool that showed 10,500 BTC ( BTC ) has been sent to a known address. The large chunk of Bitcoin is currently worth a total of $1.1 billion according to current market prices. Ardoino stated that the BTC allocation made by the stablecoin -issuing firm is part of its initiative to support Japanese holding firm SoftBank’s investment into Twenty One Capital or XXI. He also revealed the receiving address and how much its balance was as of June 3. “Tether Group is moving 10,500 BTC to address bc1qpzt4m58zzqgp84ktyuj5tz8g8k8ssg2g2d5eeerwhx4gxulqq5mqjzm5gc as part of the pre-funding of SoftBank’s investment in Twenty One Capital (XXI),” said Ardoino in his post. Price chart for Bitcoin in the past few hours, June 3, 2025 | Source: crypto.news You might also like: Metaplanet adds 1,088 BTC to Bitcoin holdings, boosting the total to 8,888 BTC Not long after the SoftBank allocation, the company then moved another 917.47 BTC to a different address that is linked to pre-funding for Twenty One Capital. Ardoino said the allocation is part of the option for convert investors into Twenty One Capital. According to current market prices, Bitcoin has dipped slightly by 0.2% in the past 24 hours. The largest cryptocurrency by market cap is currently trading hands $105,241. Bitcoin’s market cap stands at $2.09 trillion, declining by 0.14%. A day prior to the SoftBank investment, Tether ( USDT ) Group alongside Bitifinex also invested into Twenty One Capital. The joint investment amounted to 25,812 BTC or equal to approximately $2.7 billion, which was sent to a new address that was linked to Twenty One Capital. Twenty One Capital is a Bitcoin Treasury firm that is being launched by Cantor Fitzgerald’s Chairman Brandon Lutnick. It is also owned by iFinex and Tether, and will be led by Strike CEO Jack Mallers. As previously reported crypto.news, Twenty One Capital intends to launch with more than than 42,000 BTC in its Bitcoin Treasury. Twenty One Capitol will be listed on Nasdaq through a SPAC merger with Cantor Equity Partners under ticker XXI. You might also like: Strike’s Jack Mallers named CEO of Bitcoin-focused Twenty One Capital

title: Australia Crypto ATM Rules: Crucial New Limits Imposed
body: BitcoinWorld Australia Crypto ATM Rules: Crucial New Limits Imposed Significant changes are coming for anyone using or operating a crypto ATM in Australia. The nation’s financial intelligence agency, the Australian Transaction Reports and Analysis Centre (AUSTRAC), has announced new, stricter operating rules and transaction limits specifically targeting crypto ATM operators. This move is a clear signal from Australian regulators about their intent to prevent the potential misuse of these machines for illicit activities. Understanding the New Australia Crypto ATM Rules The core of AUSTRAC’s new framework for crypto ATM operators revolves around enhanced anti-money laundering (AML) and counter-terrorism financing (CTF) measures. The primary goal, as reported, is to prevent criminal abuse of crypto ATMs. These machines, while offering convenient access to cryptocurrencies, can also pose risks if not properly regulated, potentially becoming conduits for money laundering or other financial crimes. So, what exactly are the key components of these new Australia crypto ATM rules ? AUSTRAC has outlined several specific requirements and limitations: Transaction Limits: A strict cap of $3,250 AUD has been placed on both deposits and withdrawals per transaction at crypto ATMs. This limit aims to make it harder for large sums of illicit funds to be moved through these machines without scrutiny. Fraud Warning Signs: Operators are now required to display prominent warning signs about potential scams and fraud associated with cryptocurrency transactions. This is a crucial step in protecting consumers who might be vulnerable to fraudulent schemes. Strengthened Transaction Monitoring: Crypto ATM operators must implement more robust systems to monitor transactions. This includes identifying suspicious patterns of activity that might indicate money laundering or other criminal behaviour. Enhanced Customer Due Diligence (CDD): Operators are mandated to strengthen their processes for identifying and verifying their customers. This means customers using crypto ATMs may face more rigorous identity checks, particularly for transactions approaching the new limit. These measures collectively represent a significant tightening of oversight for Crypto ATM operators Australia . Why is AUSTRAC Introducing These Crypto Regulations? AUSTRAC’s role is to protect Australia’s financial system from criminal abuse. Cryptocurrencies and the infrastructure surrounding them, like ATMs, are relatively new technologies that can be exploited by criminals seeking to move illicit funds outside traditional banking channels. By introducing these specific AUSTRAC crypto regulations , the agency is proactively addressing these risks. The convenience of crypto ATMs – allowing users to quickly convert cash to crypto or vice versa – makes them attractive targets for illicit activities. Without proper controls, they could facilitate layering or integration stages of money laundering. These new rules are designed to build a stronger regulatory perimeter around this specific part of the crypto ecosystem. What Do the New Crypto ATM Limits Australia Mean for Users and Operators? The introduction of these limits and requirements has distinct implications for both the businesses running the machines and the individuals using them. For Crypto ATM Operators Australia: The new rules necessitate operational changes. Operators must: Update their software to enforce the $3,250 transaction limit. Revise their Know Your Customer (KYC) and Customer Due Diligence (CDD) procedures to meet AUSTRAC’s enhanced requirements. This might involve implementing new identity verification technologies or processes. Install physical signage for fraud warnings at their ATM locations. Invest in or upgrade their transaction monitoring systems to detect suspicious activity more effectively. Potentially face increased compliance costs and administrative burdens. Ensure staff are adequately trained on the new procedures and regulations. Compliance is not optional. Failure to adhere to these new AUSTRAC crypto regulations could result in significant penalties. For Users of Crypto ATMs: For individuals using crypto ATMs, the most noticeable change will be the transaction limit. If you typically conduct larger transactions, you will need to use alternative methods, such as cryptocurrency exchanges. You may also encounter more stringent identity verification steps, even for transactions below the limit, as operators strengthen their CDD processes. While potentially less convenient for high-value users, these measures are intended to increase the safety and integrity of the service, protecting users from unwittingly participating in illicit financial flows or falling victim to scams highlighted by the new warning signs. How Do These Australian Crypto Laws Fit into the Bigger Picture? These specific rules for crypto ATMs are part of a broader effort by the Australian government to establish a comprehensive regulatory framework for digital assets. Australia has been actively working on how to regulate the crypto sector, addressing everything from exchange licensing to consumer protection. These Australian crypto laws are evolving, and the ATM rules represent a targeted intervention in a specific area identified as high-risk. Compared to some other jurisdictions, Australia is taking a measured approach, focusing on known risk points like cash-to-crypto conversions facilitated by ATMs. This contrasts with countries that might impose blanket bans or require full licensing for all crypto activities from the outset. The focus on AML/CTF aligns with global standards set by bodies like the Financial Action Task Force (FATF). Benefits and Challenges of the New Framework Implementing these Australia crypto ATM rules brings both potential benefits and challenges. Benefits: Reduced Illicit Activity: The primary benefit is hindering criminals from using crypto ATMs for money laundering and other financial crimes. Increased Consumer Protection: Fraud warnings and enhanced scrutiny can help protect users from scams. Enhanced Integrity: A more regulated environment can build greater trust in the legitimate use of crypto ATMs. Regulatory Clarity: Operators now have clearer guidelines on their AML/CTF obligations. Challenges: Compliance Costs: Operators will incur costs to upgrade systems and processes. User Experience: Lower limits and stricter verification might inconvenience some users. Potential for Workarounds: Criminals may seek alternative methods or structures to circumvent the limits. Balancing Innovation: Regulations must be carefully balanced to avoid stifling legitimate innovation in the crypto space. AUSTRAC’s approach attempts to strike this balance by targeting specific risks without shutting down the service entirely. Actionable Insights for Operators and Users For Crypto ATM operators Australia , the message is clear: compliance is paramount. Review your current systems and procedures immediately to ensure they meet the new AUSTRAC standards. Engage with compliance experts if necessary and train your staff thoroughly on the updated requirements for transaction monitoring and customer due diligence. Transparency with your users about the changes, particularly the new Crypto ATM limits Australia , is also essential. For users, be aware of the $3,250 limit. If you need to transact larger amounts, plan to use regulated exchanges or other platforms. Always be vigilant about fraud, paying attention to the warning signs posted at ATMs. Understand that requests for identity verification are now a standard part of the process designed to protect the integrity of the financial system. Conclusion: A Step Towards a Safer Crypto Ecosystem in Australia The introduction of new Australia crypto ATM rules by AUSTRAC marks a significant step in enhancing the regulatory oversight of digital currency transactions within the country. By imposing clear transaction limits, mandating fraud warnings, and strengthening monitoring and customer verification, AUSTRAC aims to significantly reduce the risk of crypto ATMs being exploited for criminal purposes. While these changes present challenges for Crypto ATM operators Australia in terms of compliance and may require users to adjust to new limits and procedures, they are ultimately intended to foster a safer and more secure environment for interacting with cryptocurrencies. These Australian crypto laws are part of a global trend towards greater regulation in the digital asset space, signalling Australia’s commitment to combating financial crime within this evolving sector. The focus on targeted AUSTRAC crypto regulations for high-risk areas like ATMs demonstrates a pragmatic approach to integrating digital currencies into the regulated financial landscape. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping the digital asset space. This post Australia Crypto ATM Rules: Crucial New Limits Imposed first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: How Mutuum Finance (MUTM) IS Taking Over Crypto and Coming For Solana (SOL)
body: Investors are not waiting for the next Solana (SOL) breakout. Serious investors looking to grow their investment understand that a new token in the DeFi space is the future of 10x gains or more. So far, the Mutuum Finance (MUTM) token has been a roaring success in all aspects. Let us take a look at how this project could make bigger gains for investors than Solana (SOL). Innovative Platform Design The Mutuum Finance (MUTM) project takes the DeFi industry to new heights with its revolutionary innovations. One of them is the incentives system for liquidity support. When a depositor supplies assets into the ecosystem, they go into common pools that earn variable interest rates determined by the pool’s utilization rate. When a depositor adds liquidity to the protocol, they receive mtTokens, which represent their share in the pool, plus accrued interest. The deposits are tracked via smart contracts, which uphold the non-custodial nature of the protocol. Various liquidation safeguards are in place, including a Certik audit that helps to protect the protocol’s resilience. These liquidation safeguards are meant to ensure that the top-tier pools do not run out of liquidity. Various tools are employed, including automated adjustments. Every action is governed by open-source code to ensure the highest degree of transparency. Some of the features in place to protect the platform include: Over-collateralization Borrowers who want to access assets from lenders must over-collateralize their position. They acknowledge that the value of their collateral can fluctuate, thus requiring sufficient headroom. If the value of collateral dips below a certain level, then the collateral becomes eligible for liquidation. Liquidators are then given a discount to purchase the debt. The process ensures there is a healthy buffer between assets and liabilities. Asset Caps Asset caps ensure that there is a limit on how much a given asset can be added to Mutuum Finance. It ensures the protocol does not have excess exposure to one type of asset, which may have heightened volatility or low liquidity. Additionally, it limits the impact that unlimited asset minting can have on the ecosystem. Setting the right deposit limit involves checking numerous metrics like trading volume, price stability, and historical performance. Besides deposits, Mutuum Finance (MUTM) also sets limits on the borrowing of certain assets. The caps ensure that tokens are not exposed to price manipulation or liquidity shortages. By setting limits on volumes borrowed, Mutuum Finance reduces the chances of insolvency triggered by sharp price changes. Restricted Collateralization Certain assets with low liquidity might be placed in the restricted collateralization mode. In this mode, a single collateral asset can only be used to borrow the same asset or with higher limitations. For instance, if the token’s price oracle is prone to manipulation, restrictions like this ensure there is no wide-scale impact on the ecosystem.. Enhanced Collateral Efficiency For assets that have correlated price movement, like stablecoins, Mutuum Finance will offer the Enhanced Collateral Efficiency (ECE). It ensures that they have elevated borrowing limits when both collateral and the loan are in the same group. It ensures that participants benefit from better capital efficiency while protecting the overall ecosystem. The feature is only available to tokens that demonstrate near identical market behavior or consistent pegs. Loan-to-Value (LTV) Ratio The LTV ratio is used to determine the quality of a token on the platform. For instance, an LTV of 75% for MATIC means that a user who adds 1 MATIC to a pool as collateral can borrow up to 0.75 MATIC worth of another token. The exact LTV is based on market metrics and will fluctuate over time as asset prices change. Liquidation Penalty Once a debt becomes undercollateralized, the platform deems it unsafe. Liquidators can then purchase the debt to stabilize the protocol. When a position is liquidated, there is a penalty, equivalent to the liquidation bonus given to the liquidator. A portion of the penalty goes to the treasury. This measure is used to ensure the long-term solvency of the protocol. Reserve Factor A reserve factor is used to determine the fraction of the borrower’s interest that is collected from the borrower. Tokens that are more stable will carry a small reserve factor, while more volatile ones are given a higher one to account for the higher uncertainty. Mutuum Finance (MUTM) Presale Success The innovative design of the platform has led to an increase in presale participation recently. So far, the presale has raised over $9.9 million from over 11,500 participants. Tokens are selling for $0.03 in Phase 5, and over 20% of the tokens have been sold since the current phase began about a week ago. At this rate, this could be the fastest phase in the presale. The reason why tokens are selling off much faster than in phase 1, when prices were at $0.01, is the recent release of the Certik audit. That has boosted trust in the project, accelerating demand. For anyone looking to be part of this innovative platform, getting into the current phase guarantees a 100% ROI based on the listing price of $0.06. For more information about Mutuum Finance (MUTM), visit the links below: Website: https://www.mutuum.com/ Linktree: https://linktr.ee/mutuumfinance Disclaimer: This is a sponsored press release for informational purposes only. It does not reflect the views of Times Tabloid, nor is it intended to be used as legal, tax, investment, or financial advice. Times Tabloid is not responsible for any financial losses. The post How Mutuum Finance (MUTM) IS Taking Over Crypto and Coming For Solana (SOL) appeared first on Times Tabloid .

title: Is Altcoin Season Over Or It Never Started? Here’s What Historical Data Says
body: Following the explosive 2021 Bitcoin and crypto bull run, the expectations of an “altcoin season” have become even more pronounced. This term refers to a period where the prices of altcoins rise rapidly and outperform the Bitcoin price by a large margin. Usually, this happens after the Bitcoin price has put in a new all-time high, and money is rotated into altcoins. However, this has not been the case this cycle. So what happened to altcoin season? Altcoin Season Has Not Started Yet Crypto analyst and expert Michaël van de Poppe took to the X (formerly Twitter) platform to share with his over 790,000 followers that the altcoin season has yet to begin. This goes against the widespread belief that the altcoin season has already come and gone, and is officially over. According to van de Poppe, the altcoin market is actually still in a bear market, but it is about to end. The analyst’s prediction comes as the Bitcoin price remains above six figures, and yet the altcoin market continues to struggle close to its lows. Despite the abysmal market movement and the massive decline in positive sentiment, the crypto analyst still believes that the best is yet to come. He predicts that the crypto bull market is about to begin , and this would be bigger than ever because the bear market has gone on for so long. Furthermore, he points out that this cycle is different than previous cycles and the next 1-3 years will be different as well. Thus, he predicts many investors will miss it for being impatient. Using the chart above, which was created by crypto analyst TechDev, van de Poppe shows that the altcoin market is at a pivotal point. It shows a period where the Bitcoin price is rising and altcoins have remained flat. However, this has usually turned out to be the calm before the storm, and altcoin season tends to follow . If the analyst is right, then the altcoin season never started, and is still in the future. Market Deviations Hold Back Altcoins As Michaël van de Poppe mentioned, this cycle has been quite different from the previous one, and there have been a few reasons for this. The first is the advent of large buys from institutions such as Michael Saylor’s Strategy and heavy hitters like BlackRock buying up Bitcoin through exchange-traded funds (ETFs) . The natural consequence of this is that money is now only staying in Bitcoin rather than rotating out at the top into altcoins like last cycle. Also, a big difference between the current cycle and the 2020-2021 cycle is the availability of free cash. Following the COVID-19 lockdown of 2020, governments around the world disbursed billions of dollars to citizens to help them weather the storm, and this ‘free cash’ had inadvertently found its way into the market, triggering a massive altcoin season. Other factors that have been pointed out to have contributed to this are the extreme P2P that emerged with the advent of instant meme coin creations. Thousands of new coins flood the market daily, and this has left liquidity spread thin. Also, broader macroeconomic factors such as Donald Trump’s tariff wars have contributed greatly to keeping market performance muted, and the weaker altcoins have suffered more for it.

title: droppRWA taps RAFAL to tokenize real estate properties in Saudi Arabia
body: droppRWA, a subsidiary of droppGroup and a global provider of sovereign-grade Web3 AI and blockchain infrastructure, has partnered with Saudi RAFAL Real Estate Co. a real estate developer, to execute the first KSA real-world asset (RWA) tokenization of property markets under the RAFAL pilot. The RAFAL pilot will serve as a national feasibility benchmark for the future of tokenized property markets within Saudi Arabia . By redefining real estate ownership, the partnership aims to introduce fractional ownership of high-value real estate assets, allowing Saudi citizens to invest with amounts starting as low as single-digit riyals. droppRWA is on Saudi Arabia’s Vision 2030 timeline As per the announcement, the democratized access model aligns directly with Vision 2030’s objectives of financial inclusion, digital transformation, and citizen empowerment. The initiative is also designed to attract institutional-grade foreign capital through compliant digital frameworks, unlocking trillions in local and foreign direct investment (FDI) capital via a fully regulated, blockchain-based investment channel. droppRWA, in collaboration with leading consultancies, will conduct a comprehensive feasibility study for property tokenization across RAFAL’s portfolio. Additionally, a fully regulated proof-of-concept will be created and executed, with RAFAL providing live real estate assets for controlled transaction testing. Faisal Al Monai, co-founder of droppRWA, stated, “This transaction marks a paradigm shift. Around the world, we are witnessing the greatest digital transformation of the 21st century – the transformation of capital itself. The mission of this partnership positions Saudi Arabia at the forefront of programmable economies, with real-world impact for every citizen – starting at just 1 Riyal.” Elias Abousamra, CEO of RAFAL Real Estate, remarked, “At RAFAL, we have always believed that real estate should be both aspirational and accessible. This partnership with droppRWA is not just about technology, it’s about democratizing real estate investment and creating a global platform for foreign direct investment into the promising Saudi market. For the first time, a young Saudi can own a piece of a premium development with just a few Riyals.” RAFAL initiative to start as tokenization pilot for real estate markets The pilot aims to establish a sovereign-grade blockchain system powered by advanced AI for real estate markets. It will also introduce compliant, blockchain-based investment instruments to promote capital market sophistication. Saudi citizens , as well as foreign investors, will be able to co-own real estate through accessible digital investment channels The founder of droppGroup, also the founder of droppRWA Faisal Al Monai visited Aramco along with Tether. He stated on LinkedIn, “A great feeling representing droppGroup and Tether.io meeting with aramco – The digital economy is the future and the future is here. Real World Asset tokenization transforms today’s capital into tomorrow’s value and profit.” KEY Difference Wire : the secret tool crypto projects use to get guaranteed media coverage

title: Ripple Strikes Major Deal: Germany’s DZ BANK Goes Live with XRP Custody
body: The post Ripple Strikes Major Deal: Germany’s DZ BANK Goes Live with XRP Custody appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Ripple just made a massive move in Europe, quietly. According to crypto analyst pumpius on X, Germany’s second-largest bank, DZ BANK, has officially gone live with a Ripple-powered digital asset custody platform. With over €350 billion in assets under custody, this partnership marks a huge milestone for Ripple, especially as it slips into the core infrastructure of traditional finance without making a huge hype. A Building Block for the Digital Euro? DZ BANK’s integration comes under Germany’s forward-looking Electronic Securities Act (eWpG), which allows institutions to issue digital securities without paper certificates. This legal structure has opened the door for Ripple to become a backbone for tokenized assets and, potentially, CBDC development. Analysts even called it “CBDC infrastructure, disguised as custody”, a major signal of what’s brewing behind the scenes. Tokenized Bonds, Crypto Securities & XRP Ripple is quietly making its way into traditional banking, and now it’s starting to show. Germany’s second-biggest bank, DZ BANK, is officially using Ripple’s technology to manage digital assets like tokenized bonds and crypto securities. The move is fully approved under German law. .article-inside-link { margin-left: 0 !important; border: 1px solid #0052CC4D; border-left: 0; border-right: 0; padding: 10px 0; text-align: left; } .entry ul.article-inside-link li { font-size: 14px; line-height: 21px; font-weight: 600; list-style-type: none; margin-bottom: 0; display: inline-block; } .entry ul.article-inside-link li:last-child { display: none; } Also Read : Norway’s NBX Joins Bitcoin Treasury Trend, Stock Jumps 138% , Instead of making a big public splash, Ripple is focusing on building quietly behind the scenes. The goal is to become part of the financial system from the inside. It’s no longer just about cross-border payments. Ripple is now creating tools that help banks manage digital assets from start to finish, including issuing, storing, and settling them. Interestingly, DZ BANK has become the first major European bank to put Ripple’s institutional-grade custody system into real-world use. This move could set the stage for other top-tier banks to follow. At the center of it all is XRP, serving as the bridge that ties the entire digital asset process together, from issuance to settlement. Ripple’s “Silent Infiltration” Strategy Without hype or headlines, Ripple’s tech is steadily becoming foundational in regulated finance. As the analyst noted , this is a “silent infiltration,” and DZ BANK could be just the beginning. } document.addEventListener('click', function(event) { var clickedItem = event.target.closest('.subscription-options li'); if (clickedItem) { var checkbox = clickedItem.querySelector('input[type="checkbox"]'); if (checkbox) { checkbox.checked = !checkbox.checked; updateSubscriptionButton(); } } }); FAQs What is DZ BANK? DZ BANK stands for Deutsche Zentral-Genossenschaftsbank, translating to “German Central Cooperative Bank.” It’s Germany’s second-largest bank by assets and the central institution for approximately 700 cooperative banks. How is Ripple involved with DZ BANK? Ripple has partnered with DZ BANK to provide a digital asset custody platform for tokenized bonds and crypto securities. This integration positions Ripple’s technology within Germany’s regulated financial infrastructure. What is the Electronic Securities Act (eWpG)? Germany’s eWpG allows institutions to issue digital securities without paper certificates, facilitating the tokenization of assets. This legal framework enables Ripple’s technology to be utilized for managing digital assets like tokenized bonds and crypto securities. How does XRP fit into Ripple’s European strategy? XRP serves as a bridge asset within Ripple’s platform, facilitating the issuance, settlement, and transfer of digital assets. Its integration into DZ BANK’s custody system underscores XRP’s role in Ripple’s broader adoption within traditional finance.

title: XRP Price Prediction 2025: Expert Warns of Historic 90% Crash
body: The post XRP Price Prediction 2025: Expert Warns of Historic 90% Crash appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News XRP could be heading for a dramatic price move — and an expert is sounding the alarm. Drawing comparisons to XRP’s explosive rally and subsequent crash in 2017, the expert warns that while a major price surge could be on the horizon, it could quickly be followed by a devastating 90% crash. History May Be Repeating Itself According to the expert’s chart analysis, XRP is mirroring its 2017 price structure, when a Bullish Stochastic RSI (SRSI) cross on the monthly time frame triggered a 20x price surge. Back then, XRP skyrocketed before crashing 96%, wiping out unsuspecting investors the analyst refers to as “dumb money.” Source: Jaydee The chart shows that XRP is once again approaching a critical SRSI cross, a signal that previously preceded the 2017 rally. The analyst added, “2017 looks a lot like present time before the 20x move.” If history repeats, XRP could see a sharp rally before facing another severe sell-off. The Warning: Be the 5%, Not the 95% The analyst challenges traders to be part of the 5% ‘smart money’ who take profits before the market turns. The chart marks a future “pink box” area where he predicts a 90% crash could occur after the next market top. “Will you be the 5% who takes advantage before the 90% crash… or will you lose like dumb money by the end of the cycle?” the analyst warns. He also said that while “utility” narratives may drive price speculation temporarily, the window to exit profitably could be short-lived. Once the market euphoria peaks, history is proof that a brutal correction typically follows. SRSI Confirmation Needed For now, the key indicator to watch is the monthly Stochastic RSI cross. The analyst warns that this signal needs to confirm itself before traders act, but insists the setup is eerily similar to the conditions that sparked XRP’s historic 2017 rally. “Are we going to confirm this cross?” the analyst teases, hinting at a make-or-break moment for XRP’s price trajectory.

title: SEC’s Hester Peirce Pushes for In-Kind Redemptions for Bitcoin ETFs
body: The post SEC’s Hester Peirce Pushes for In-Kind Redemptions for Bitcoin ETFs appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News In a recent interview, SEC Commissioner Hester Peirce revealed that the agency is open to reconsidering in-kind redemptions for Bitcoin ETFs. This could be a game-changer for crypto investors, offering smoother processes and important tax benefits. Peirce, who’s well-known for her pro-crypto views, explained that letting investors redeem ETF shares for actual Bitcoin instead of cash would make the whole system more efficient and less costly when it comes to taxes. Why In-Kind Redemptions Are Important In-kind redemptions have been a frequent topic among investors and ETF providers. Peirce said this is something the SEC plans to address sooner rather than later. During a Coinage Media interview , she pointed out that allowing ETF issuers to create products that best serve investors – and reduce operational challenges – is key. “How can you let people design products in a way that’s most helpful for investors in those products?” Peirce asked, hinting at a shift toward investor-driven innovation. Her comments quickly caught the attention of the crypto community, especially on social media where industry insiders praised her openness. The Issues with Cash Redemptions Right now, Bitcoin ETFs use a cash redemption model. This means ETF issuers have to sell Bitcoin on the market to pay investors who redeem shares. This often triggers taxable events and adds extra costs. Peirce supports switching to in-kind redemptions to fix these problems. This model allows authorized participants to swap ETF shares directly for Bitcoin, making the process simpler and more tax-efficient. Big players like BlackRock and ARK Invest have already proposed such changes. Earlier this year, BlackRock filed a proposal with Nasdaq to allow in-kind redemptions for its iShares Bitcoin Trust. Analysts see this as a smart move to cut tax burdens and ease operations. SEC’s Regulatory Challenge Peirce’s remarks come at a time when the SEC is still cautious about crypto regulation. Even though the agency approved spot Bitcoin ETFs in early 2024, it has pushed for cash redemptions, frustrating many investors. Her recent comments, made during a PubKey event and noted by crypto commentator Frank Corva, show a regulator willing to listen and rethink strict rules. This could point to a more flexible approach from the SEC – one that balances investor protection with room for innovation. What This Means for Investors and the Bitcoin ETF Market Allowing in-kind redemptions could make Bitcoin ETFs more attractive by improving after-tax returns and lowering costs. Peirce’s insights suggest the SEC might soon back changes that make ETFs easier and better for investors, potentially reshaping the market for good. With major firms already pushing for these reforms, we may be on the brink of a new phase of Bitcoin ETF innovation driven by closer cooperation between the industry and regulators If the SEC follows through, in-kind redemptions could become the standard, transforming Bitcoin ETFs into more efficient and cost-effective investment tools.

title: Eurozone inflation rate is in at 1.9%, cooler than expected
body: Eurozone inflation dropped to 1.9% in May, falling below the European Central Bank’s 2% goal for the first time this year, according to data released Tuesday by Eurostat. That number came in lower than what Reuters-surveyed economists were expecting — they had forecasted a flat 2%. April’s reading was 2.2%, making this latest figure a noticeable decline. The biggest drop came from services inflation, which eased to 3.2% in May. That’s down from 4% in April and is the lowest the services category has been in over three years. Core inflation, which takes out volatile categories like energy, food, alcohol, and tobacco, also pulled back, falling to 2.3% from April’s 2.7%. Jack Allen-Reynolds, deputy chief eurozone economist at Capital Economics, said the dip in services showed that April’s spike was temporary. “May’s steep decline in services inflation, to its lowest level in more than three years, confirms that the previous month’s jump was just an Easter-related blip and that the downward trend in services inflation remains on track,” Jack said in a note. ECB weighs Eurozone May numbers ahead of Thursday rate decision ECB officials are expected to cut rates this Thursday, with markets already pricing in a 95% chance of a 25-basis-point reduction. The current deposit facility rate sits at 2.25%, slashed from the 4% high reached in mid-2023. Even though the latest data confirms a cooling trend, Jack thinks it won’t change the ECB’s decision this week much, as their mind is already made up. “But May’s inflation data strengthen the case for another cut at the following meeting in July,” he added. Meanwhile, the overall Eurozone economy is still facing serious uncertainties, thanks mostly to US President Donald Trump, who is pushing new tariff plans that are rattling global markets. His proposal for “reciprocal duties” includes targeting European Union exports. In the middle of all this, the OECD released its latest Economic Outlook on Tuesday, predicting the euro area will grow by 1% in 2025, which is unchanged from its last forecast. The OECD also expects Eurozone inflation to end the year at 2.2%, the same projection it gave in March. Bond yields dropped across the region right after the data came out. The German 10-year bond yield slipped by more than two basis points to 2.499%, while the French 10-year yield dropped by over one basis point to 3.169%. Traders saw this as a clear sign that more easing might be ahead. The euro also plunged, decreasing by about 0.3% against the dollar by Tuesday afternoon, according to data from CNBC. This continues a trend from earlier months, where signs of softer inflation typically led to weaker currency performance. title: Bitcoin Miner Bitmine Set for Exciting NYSE American Stock Listing
body: BitcoinWorld Bitcoin Miner Bitmine Set for Exciting NYSE American Stock Listing Are you following the latest developments in the world of Bitcoin mining and publicly traded crypto companies? Get ready for a significant shift! Bitcoin miner Bitmine is making a move that could change its trajectory in the financial markets. What’s Happening with Bitmine’s Stock Listing? According to a recent announcement via GlobeNewswire, the shares of common stock for the Bitcoin miner , Bitmine, are anticipated to begin trading on the New York Stock Exchange American ( NYSE American ) on or around June 5th. This marks a pivotal moment for the company and its investors. The planned stock listing on the NYSE American signifies a transition away from its current trading platform. Upon the successful completion of the listing, Bitmine’s shares will cease trading on the OTCQX market, where they have previously been available. This move is often seen as a step up for companies, potentially offering increased visibility, liquidity, and access to a broader base of institutional and retail investors. Why is a NYSE American Listing Significant for a Crypto Stock? Moving from the OTCQX to a major exchange like the NYSE American is a notable event for any company, particularly a crypto stock like Bitmine. Here’s why: Increased Visibility: Listing on a prominent exchange exposes the company to a much wider audience of potential investors and financial media. Improved Liquidity: Major exchanges typically facilitate higher trading volumes, making it easier for investors to buy and sell shares. Enhanced Credibility: Listing on the NYSE American often requires meeting stricter listing standards regarding financials, corporate governance, and reporting. This can enhance the company’s perceived credibility and legitimacy in the eyes of investors. Potential for Institutional Investment: Many institutional investors have mandates that restrict them from investing in over-the-counter stocks. A NYSE American listing can open the door to this significant pool of capital. For a Bitcoin miner , this move aligns the company more closely with traditional publicly traded companies, potentially attracting investors who are interested in the crypto sector but prefer the regulatory oversight and infrastructure of major exchanges. What Does This Mean for Bitmine Investors? Existing investors in Bitmine’s OTCQX-traded shares will see their shares transition to the NYSE American . The exact process and timing for this transition will be managed by brokerage firms. Investors should typically not need to take direct action, but it is always advisable to confirm details with their broker. The move could potentially impact the crypto stock ‘s trading dynamics, including volatility and price discovery, as it enters a new trading environment with different market participants. Looking Ahead: The Future for Bitmine on NYSE American The planned stock listing on the NYSE American is a strategic decision for Bitmine as it seeks to grow and mature as a public company. While the exact impact remains to be seen, the transition is generally viewed positively within the financial community for the reasons outlined above. As of the expected listing date around June 5th, market participants will be watching closely to see how Bitmine’s shares perform on the new exchange and how this move influences its access to capital and overall market valuation. The success of a Bitcoin miner like Bitmine on a major exchange could also serve as an indicator for other crypto-related companies considering similar transitions. This development underscores the increasing convergence of the cryptocurrency industry with traditional financial markets, offering new avenues for investors to gain exposure to digital assets through publicly traded entities. In Conclusion: A New Chapter for Bitmine Bitmine’s impending stock listing on the NYSE American represents a significant milestone. This transition from the OTCQX is expected to enhance the company’s market presence, potentially improve liquidity, and attract a wider range of investors. For those interested in the performance of Bitcoin miner companies and the broader crypto stock market, Bitmine’s debut on NYSE American will be a key event to monitor around June 5th. To learn more about the latest Bitcoin trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin price action . This post Bitcoin Miner Bitmine Set for Exciting NYSE American Stock Listing first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: Twenty One Aims to Rival MicroStrategy with Leaner Bitcoin Strategy
body: Twenty One is preparing to go public under the ticker $XXI , starting with a Bitcoin treasury of 42,000 BTC . The company directly compares itself to MicroStrategy (MSTR), presenting a more focused and efficient model for Bitcoin exposure. Unlike MicroStrategy, which has over 500,000 BTC and must spend significantly to maintain returns, Twenty One promotes a more nimble and capital-efficient structure. The company claims full scores across six categories, including Bitcoin-native operations, zero existing debt, and tailored KPIs focused on Bitcoin. Tether and Bitfinex will play a major role in Twenty One’s funding by contributing Bitcoin and capital in return for equity. An additional $462M in Bitcoin purchases is expected after SPAC and PIPE financing closes. The transaction structure includes multiple mergers and equity conversions to streamline its market entry. Key strengths of Twenty One include: 100% Bitcoin-native focus with no debt Higher insider ownership KPIs built specifically for Bitcoin performance If successful, this structure could make Twenty One a go-to vehicle for investors looking for simplified, direct Bitcoin exposure without the complications of large, diversified tech firms like MicroStrategy.

title: Toshi price prediction for 2025 and beyond: Paws up or pullback?
body: In May 2025, the cat-themed meme token Toshi jumped over 60% — but now it’s starting to dip again. Wondering where Toshi’s headed in June, the rest of the year, and beyond? Is Toshi a good investment? Check out our Toshi price prediction to find out. Table of Contents What is Toshi? Toshi coin price prediction: general outlook Toshi price prediction 2025 Toshi price prediction 2030 What is Toshi? Toshi ( TOSHI ) is a meme token with gaming roots, named after the cat of Coinbase co-founder Brian Armstrong — a playful nod to Bitcoin’s mysterious creator, Satoshi Nakamoto. Built on Base and backed by Coinbase, Toshi has quickly earned its spot in the crypto scene, thanks to loyal fans and sharp strategic moves. Eyes forward. Tail high. Nothing can stop us! pic.twitter.com/DKyJAKyXJr — TOSHI (@Toshi_base) May 28, 2025 Toshi isn’t just for laughs — it’s made for real use, especially in microtransactions and digital content. Its community lives on Telegram and Discord, where things stay active and fun. With tools like Toshi Tools and its own collectible NFToshis, it brings both value and vibes. That balance of entertainment and usefulness is what gives Toshi its edge in the meme coin crowd. What can we expect from TOSHI in the future? Let’s turn to the Toshi crypto price prediction. Toshi coin price prediction: general outlook May 2025 turned out to be a strong month for Toshi, with the meme token jumping approximately 60.5%. In the first half of the month, it peaked at $0.000677. However, the rally cooled off a bit — over the past week, the price dipped by nearly 20%. As of June 03, Toshi is trading at $0.0005667 TOSHI 1-monthchart, June 2025 | Source: crypto.news Toshi’s future will depend on a combination of factors, including strong community engagement, viral momentum on social platforms, and overall sentiment toward meme coins in the broader crypto market. Continued activity on Telegram, Discord, and X will be crucial to maintaining hype, while any acknowledgment — direct or subtle — from Coinbase or major crypto figures could significantly boost investor interest. As Toshi is built on the Base blockchain, the token also stands to benefit from the network’s growth and adoption. Upcoming feature releases like enhanced Toshi Tools, new NFToshis drops, or gamified community incentives could attract fresh attention and reignite enthusiasm. At the same time, the possibility of being listed on additional exchanges or picked up by popular influencers could drive speculative spikes. You might also like: Can the meme coins rally again? Dogecoin, Shiba Inu and Pepe dip slightly Still, meme coins are inherently volatile, and Toshi is no exception. While price swings are to be expected, its distinctive branding, playful identity, and dedicated fanbase give it the potential to remain a standout in the ever-shifting meme coin landscape. Here’s a closer look at the Toshi price prediction for 2025 and the years that follow. Toshi price prediction 2025 According to CoinCodex’s TOSHI price prediction, there is short-term pessimism, with the coin potentially dropping to $0.000509 by June 26. Their technical analysis reflects a generally positive sentiment, showing 24 indicators signaling bullish trends compared to just 2 indicating bearish movement. CoinCodex’s broader forecast for TOSHI in 2025 predicts the token will trade between $0.000466 and $0.001877 throughout the year. DigitalCoinPrice offers a very optimistic Toshi price prediction, estimating the coin will trade between $0.00137 and $0.00148 in 2025, initially surpassing its previous all-time high of $0.00227 for a short period. On the other hand, Wallet Investor also provides a favorable Toshi price forecast. According to their projection, TOSHI may reach a maximum of $0.001061 by the end of 2025. Will Toshi go up or down in five years? Toshi price prediction 2030 According to CoinCodex’s long-term expectations for TOSHI, it is forecasted to trade between $0.000923 and $0.00292 by 2030. DigitalCoinPrice projects that the value of the Toshi meme coin could range between $0.00322 and $0.00373 by the same year. Wallet Investor believes that by late May 2030, TOSHI could reach a maximum of $0.00218. Should you invest in Toshi? Toshi is a high-risk, high-reward asset that thrives on community strength, cultural appeal, and market momentum. If you’re drawn to the meme coin space and comfortable with volatility, it could be a fun, speculative addition to your portfolio. Just remember: with coins like Toshi, timing and sentiment are everything — so invest only what you’re willing to ride out the waves with. title: Pioneering Solana Dubai Collaboration with VARA Boosts Crypto Future
body: BitcoinWorld Pioneering Solana Dubai Collaboration with VARA Boosts Crypto Future Exciting news from the heart of the Middle East! The Solana Foundation has officially joined forces with Dubai’s Virtual Assets Regulatory Authority (VARA) through a significant Memorandum of Understanding (MOU). This partnership signals a strong commitment from both sides to foster a collaborative environment for the burgeoning crypto and blockchain sectors in Dubai. It’s a move that could significantly shape the future of Solana Dubai and the wider digital asset landscape in the region. Why is the Solana Foundation Partnering with VARA Dubai? The core purpose of this MOU, announced via the Solana Foundation’s X account, is to bridge the gap between crypto innovators and regulatory bodies. This collaboration aims to create a clearer, more supportive ecosystem for blockchain development . By working closely with VARA Dubai , the Solana Foundation seeks to: Facilitate open dialogue between developers building on Solana and the regulators overseeing the virtual assets space. Share knowledge and best practices to ensure innovation happens responsibly. Identify potential challenges and work together on solutions. This proactive approach to engagement is crucial for the sustainable growth of any technology, especially one as disruptive as blockchain. What Does the MOU Entail? Key Areas of Collaboration The agreement outlines several key areas where the Solana Foundation and VARA will focus their joint efforts. These initiatives are designed to build a robust and compliant environment for blockchain technology in Dubai: Talent Development Programs A major focus is on nurturing local talent. This involves creating educational programs and initiatives to train individuals in blockchain development , specifically focusing on the Solana ecosystem. A skilled workforce is essential for building and scaling decentralized applications (dApps). Data Sharing and Workshops Regular data sharing and interactive workshops are planned. This will allow VARA to gain deeper insights into the technical aspects and market dynamics of the Solana network, while providing developers with a better understanding of regulatory expectations and compliance requirements in Dubai’s jurisdiction. Advisory Sessions The partnership includes provisions for advisory sessions. These sessions will offer guidance to developers navigating the regulatory landscape and provide VARA with expert technical input from the Solana Foundation . This two-way communication is vital for creating effective and informed crypto regulation . Support for a Solana Economic Zone Perhaps one of the most ambitious aspects is the support for establishing a dedicated Solana Economic Zone in Dubai. While details are still emerging, such a zone could potentially offer tailored regulatory frameworks, incentives, and infrastructure to attract Solana-based projects and businesses, positioning Dubai as a hub for the Solana ecosystem in the MENA region. Benefits of the Solana Foundation – VARA Dubai Partnership This collaboration offers mutual benefits for both the Solana Foundation and VARA Dubai , as well as the broader crypto community in the UAE: For Solana Foundation: Provides a clear pathway for growth and adoption in a strategically important global hub with a forward-thinking regulatory body. Facilitates direct engagement with regulators to shape future policies. For VARA Dubai: Enhances regulatory understanding of a leading blockchain platform. Positions Dubai as a welcoming yet well-regulated destination for blockchain innovation. Allows for proactive development of crypto regulation tailored to specific technologies. For Developers & Businesses: Offers greater regulatory certainty, access to talent development resources, and potential support structures within a dedicated economic zone. Reduces friction in launching and operating blockchain projects. For the Crypto Ecosystem in Dubai: Attracts investment, talent, and innovation. Fosters a more mature and responsible market environment. Challenges and Considerations While the MOU is a positive step, implementing such a partnership isn’t without its challenges: Balancing Innovation and Regulation: Finding the right balance between fostering rapid blockchain development and ensuring robust consumer protection and market integrity is a continuous challenge. Pace of Change: The crypto space evolves rapidly. Regulations need to be adaptable without being overly burdensome. Global Coordination: While this focuses on Solana Dubai , crypto regulation often requires international coordination to prevent regulatory arbitrage. Addressing these will require ongoing communication and a willingness to adapt from both the Solana Foundation and VARA Dubai . What Does This Mean for the Future of Crypto in Dubai? This partnership is a strong indicator of Dubai’s ambition to become a global leader in the virtual assets space. By collaborating directly with a major blockchain ecosystem like Solana, VARA is demonstrating a willingness to engage deeply with the technology it regulates. This could pave the way for more tailored and effective crypto regulation , encouraging further investment and innovation. The focus on talent development also suggests a long-term vision for building a sustainable ecosystem within Dubai, not just attracting external projects. The potential for a Solana Economic Zone could be a game-changer, providing a concentrated environment for growth. Actionable Insights for Developers and Businesses For those involved in blockchain development or looking to launch crypto businesses, this MOU provides clear signals: Look to Dubai: The emirate is actively creating pathways for blockchain projects. Engage with VARA: Understand the regulatory requirements and leverage resources provided through partnerships like this. Build Responsibly: Focus on compliance and user protection from the outset. Explore the Solana Ecosystem: With the Solana Foundation ‘s direct involvement, opportunities within this specific network in Dubai are likely to increase. Conclusion: A Promising Step for Solana and Dubai The signing of this MOU between the Solana Foundation and VARA Dubai marks a significant milestone. It signifies a mutual commitment to collaboration, innovation, and responsible growth in the virtual assets sector. By focusing on talent, data sharing, and creating supportive environments like a potential Solana Economic Zone, this partnership is set to boost blockchain development and help shape effective crypto regulation in one of the world’s most dynamic cities. This is a promising development that could accelerate the adoption and integration of blockchain technology into the mainstream economy in Dubai and beyond. To learn more about the latest crypto regulation trends, explore our article on key developments shaping blockchain institutional adoption. This post Pioneering Solana Dubai Collaboration with VARA Boosts Crypto Future first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: Matter of Time Before Altcoins Take Big Dive Against Bitcoin, According to Analyst Benjamin Cowen
body: Cryptocurrency analyst Benjamin Cowen is warning that altcoins may collapse in their Bitcoin ( BTC ) pairs any moment now. In a new strategy session, Cowen tells his 900,000 YouTube subscribers that the TOTAL 3 chart, which tracks the market cap of all digital assets excluding Bitcoin, Ethereum ( ETH ) and stablecoins, remains in a downtrend against the flagship crypto asset and has yet to find a market bottom. “I don’t care how great you think your altcoin community is. I don’t care if your developers that you follow have not yet rugged you. Altcoins, in my opinion, are oscillators at best against Bitcoin, and many of them just bleed to Bitcoin. So if individually altcoins will bleed to Bitcoin, then collectively they should as well, and that’s the reason why I think alt/Bitcoin pairs will eventually find themselves down here [at 0.25]. I think it’s just a matter of time.” Source: Benjamin Cowen/YouTube A move toward the support area highlighted by Cowen would signal that altcoins are significantly underperforming Bitcoin. Cowen also points out that altcoins are in a multi-year downtrend against Bitcoin with no signs of reversing the trend anytime soon. “I don’t know exactly when alt/Bitcoin pairs are going to go to the range lows. I can’t tell you that, but what I can say is what you’re witnessing is basically the slow conversion of people holding alts and then they are just converting them to Bitcoin… The chart tells you what’s happening. Alts put in a new low against Bitcoin [on June 1st]. So any prior altseason that was called for, any prior call for a low by alt/Bitcoin pairs up until today was wrong.” TOTAL3/BTC is currently hovering at 0.33. title: Netizens wary of Trump's new AI regulation proposals
body: President Donald Trump’s recent initiatives to reshape artificial intelligence (AI) regulation in the United States have sparked widespread apprehension among online communities and civil society organizations. Central to the controversy is the “ Big Beautiful Bill ,” a legislative proposal that would impose a 10-year moratorium on state-level AI regulations, effectively centralizing control at the federal level. The bill also provides $500 million to help federal agencies upgrade old systems with new AI tools and automation. Trump and his supporters say the plan will strengthen and advance the country. Still, many people online push back, saying it gives too much power to Washington, increases surveillance , and helps big tech while ignoring privacy risks and state protections. Trump blocks state AI laws and gives full control to Washington Trump’s “ Big Beautiful Bill ” includes Section 43201, the Artificial Intelligence and Information Technology Modernization Initiative, which presents a long-term federal plan for AI in government systems. The initiative will allocate funds to the Department of Commerce to modernize outdated technology and improve how federal agencies use commercial artificial intelligence and automation tools. The bill also blocks every US state and local government from passing laws that regulate or limit artificial intelligence models, tools, or automated systems for the next decade. Exceptions exist for state laws that don’t directly deal with AI or aim to control it, even though these cases are very limited and vague. Trump’s team says national control is better for innovation and easier for businesses that build AI tools across many states, but people strongly disagree on social media platforms like X. One user mentioned that the bill goes against the conservative values of small governments with a post saying , “So much for limited government interference .” Another user compared the plan to a scene from George Orwell’s 1984, writing , “ Palantir’s Foundry is the new telescreen, watching your every move ,” in reference to the government possibly using surveillance tools made by Palantir. Many other users also raised alarms about what the bill could mean for privacy, fairness, and power with comments like, “ It seems the purpose of this is to facilitate Palintar [sic] to control everyone in a fascist surveillance state, ” using strong language to express concern that the bill will give tech companies too much control over people’s lives. People push against bill that uses AI money to benefit big tech and risks privacy The bill allocates $500 million to upgrade outdated technology and improve government efficiency through artificial intelligence and automation. Still, people say this large sum of money wil l be nefit big-tech companies like Palantir , which have strong ties with the government. Netizens suspec t th is bill will favor powerful figures like Peter Thiel, Elon Musk, and J.D. Vance, who have investments or leadership roles in these tech companies and are linked to President Trump. One user summed up this skepticism by saying, “ Exactly what Thiel, Musk, Vance, & Palantir wanted from Trump in his Big Beautiful Bill.” At the same time, another accused the bill of enriching Trump’s family, writing, “ So he and his family ca n ma x profits .” People also think that federal agencies like the Department of Homeland Security (DHS) and FEMA will use AI tools for surveillance to infringe on people’s privacy and increase the government’s overreach. The “Big Beautiful Bill” will also prevent local governments from enforcing laws they have already created to protect residents from the dangers of AI, meaning states will not respond effectively to the challenges AI causes within their communities. Businesses trading with countries in the European Union will also struggle because the E U has im plemented its own AI Act. This means it will be difficult for American businesses to follow both US and European rules simultaneously because Trump’s bill centralizes AI regulation at the federal level and stops states from making their own rules. The result s en d up causing conflicts and creating risks for trade and data sharing that are important for many technology companies operating across borders. title: Austin King Explains Why the Next 2 Years Are Critical for Crypto’s Future
body: The post Austin King Explains Why the Next 2 Years Are Critical for Crypto’s Future appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Big changes are coming to crypto – at least if you ask Austin King, cofounder of the Omni chain. After attending the XRP Las Vegas event, King shared a bold prediction that’s making waves across the industry: “The next two years will change crypto forever.” From clear regulations to rising institutional interest, King believes we’re entering a turning point that will push crypto into its next major chapter. XRP Las Vegas confirmed one thing: the next 2 years will change crypto forever. Regulatory clarity is coming. Institutions are leaning in. Adoption and growth are about to accelerate substantially. For those who missed it, here's an overview — first off, the most important… pic.twitter.com/UBn0pzvg5h — Austin King (@OnchainAustin) June 2, 2025 Regulatory Clarity Is Almost Here According to King, the U.S. government is finally getting closer to providing clear crypto regulations. This could be a major breakthrough for the industry, which has spent years operating under uncertainty. He sees this aligning with the growing involvement of major financial players. Institutions like BlackRock and Fidelity have already launched Bitcoin and Ethereum ETFs, and Michael Saylor’s Bitcoin strategy continues to gain traction. King believes this shift will help legitimize crypto in a way that unlocks long-term growth and adoption. Institutions Are Changing Their Tune King also reflected on how much has changed in the past decade. He noted that for years, crypto had to defend itself against criticism from central banks, regulators, and traditional financial institutions that didn’t believe in it. Now, many of those same institutions are investing. Tesla’s $1.5 billion Bitcoin purchase in 2021, followed by some selling, and involvement from companies like SpaceX show how institutional interest is growing fast. King called it a “stunning pivot,” and said this shift is creating some of the biggest opportunities he’s ever seen in his eight years in crypto. Real Projects Will Lead the Next Wave King also pointed out that a major change is happening within the industry itself. For years, many crypto companies focused heavily on marketing without delivering real value. But now, that’s starting to shift. King believes we’ll soon see a big move of capital away from hype-based projects and into those creating real-world impact. “Over the next 2 years, you’ll see a significant amount of liquidity rotate from marketing-based companies to projects driving real-world impact,” he predicted. This gives forward-thinking networks a huge edge. Crypto Has a Big Role to Play King is hopeful about the future of cryptocurrency as he sees it as a reconstruction of the global financial system. The sector is expected to grow at an exceptional rate as adoption picks up speed and stability approaches. He thinks that the function of cryptocurrency in the world will be redefined in the next two years. Will his predictions come true? Time will tell. But if he’s right, the crypto space is heading for a massive evolution.
